situation.title: General Practitioner
situation.meta_description: My General Practitioner refuses to write me an eŽádanka (online request for testing facilities).

content.processed:
My General Practitioner refuses to write me an eŽádanka (online request for testing facilities).

According to the order of the Chief Hygienist and the Ministry of Health, they are obliged to arrange one for you if you have been in risky contact with an infected person or if you have symptoms of covid19.

Risky contact is contact happens in enclosed spaces, at a distance shorter than 2 m, when neither side is wearing a face mask.
